sentences.en: Amy's pitiless step - mother refused to look after her when she was seriously ill.
sentences.cn: 艾米那个铁石心肠的 继母 在她生重病时不肯照料她.

sentences.en: Catherine could think of nothing of the kind , and Morris's luminosity seemed almost pitiless.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳当然一筹莫展, 莫里斯已把问题说得清楚明白到了毫不留情的地步.

sentences.en: Do the silent - winged stars never climb the sky above your pitiless tower?
sentences.cn: 难道那翅翼不响的星辰,从来不攀登你的不仁之塔的上空 吗 ?

sentences.en: He saw the pitiless eyes of his enemy.
sentences.cn: 他看到了敌人冷酷的眼神。

sentences.en: His workers in Pittsburgh felt the full force of his pitiless Darwinism.
sentences.cn: 匹兹堡的工人充分地体会到卡耐基冷酷无情的达尔文主义.

sentences.en: Outside, the pitiless rain fell , fell steadily, with a fierce malignity that was all too human.
sentences.cn: 外面下着无情的雨, 不断地下着, 简直跟通人性那样凶狠而恶毒.

sentences.en: The fact stood out cut in stetl on the pitiless daylight.
sentences.cn: 在无情的光天化日下,这个事实是确凿无疑的.

sentences.en: The king was a pitiless ruler.
sentences.cn: 那位国王是个冷酷无情的统治者.
对格尔尼卡镇的残酷轰炸

sentences.en: The pitiless woman refused to help the poor sick girl.
sentences.cn: 这铁石心肠的妇人拒绝帮助这个生病的可怜女孩.

sentences.en: They said he is a pitiless , cold - blooded fellow , with no geniality in him.
sentences.cn: 他们说他是个毫无怜悯心 、 一点也不和蔼的冷血动物.

sentences.en: They strain, strain fiercely, against the pitiless might of the stream.
sentences.cn: 他们使劲, 拼命使劲, 对抗着水流无情的威力.

sentences.en: Why is the world so awful, cruel, pitiless that make people cry.
sentences.cn: 为什么世界会如此可怕 、 残酷 、 无情,以致于让人流泪?

sentences.en: Yet, the wind and rain beat their thin faces pitiless.
sentences.cn: 但风雨透过木墙无情地打向她们的小脸.

words.tran_cn: 对……表示怜悯；对……感到同情

trans.tran_cn: 没有怜悯心的，无情的，忍心
trans.tran_en: showing no pity and not caring if people suffer
